channel.title: Using hamachi to play other pplz server?
channel.description:
HEY everyone i was just wanting to know if anyone can give me a guide on how to use hamchi to play other pplz hamachi servers if u want u can post it here or you can add my msn it is= kamakazi12345@hotmail.com
thanky cola..!
P.S. if u help me do it once i get my server online i will make you the co-owner/admin ;D

item.title: Using hamachi to play other pplz server?
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

i dnt use hamachi that much but i posted something like this and they replied me something like this

1.download hamchi
2.open it
3.theres 3 buttons on bottom, click on middle one that looks like triangle
4.then choose join server or somethinng like that
5.type hamachi name and pass of server
6.join one of the ones that come out

Read full topic
item.source: Using hamachi to play other pplz server?

item.title: Using hamachi to play other pplz server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey, Hey, its me again, ok this is what you do, go to this site:

www.hamachi.cc

Then, download it, Extract it, Make up a name and then look on the bottom left-hand corner, You’ll see a power button, move your eyes slowly to the right untill you seea triangle sorta thing, this is where you can Creat or Join a network… GO to Join a network and then type this in

Dan’s Isle2

NOTE: The username is (CASE SENSITIVE)

And for the Password type in

123

And then, click O.K and then you’ll see a network with me come up and then if there is a green Light Next to my name, you can see if its up, or just ahve a chat with me

~P1mp 0wn4g3

Read full topic
